snippet: President Nicolas Sarkozy praised the journalists, one of whom was seriously injured, and called the process to bring them home to France “extremely complicated.”
lead_paragraph: President Nicolas Sarkozy praised the journalists, one of whom was seriously injured, and called the process to bring them home to France “extremely complicated.”

headline.seo: French Journalists Home After Being Trapped in Syria
headline.main: French Journalists Return Home After 9 Days Trapped in Syria
headline.print_headline: French Journalists Return Home After 9 Days Trapped in Syria
